data.title: Andy Roberts Music, News and Writings
data.text:
Biography for Andy Roberts - Musician

Acoustic Singer-Songwriter on the Isle of Wight

A committed solo acoustic guitarist and singer whose music is a blend of reflection and authenticity. Influenced by his surroundings and personal journey, Andy's songs deeply resonate with listeners, providing a genuine connection to his narratives.

The Power of Music in Challenging Times

As the world began to emerge from the confines of lockdown, a simple stroll around Andy's village revealed something profound. Locals approached, expressing their heartfelt gratitude for the solace his weekly Facebook concerts provided during those isolating months. This unexpected revelation was transformative for Andy. Recognizing the profound emotional impact of his live music, he renewed his dedication to it. Now, with a mission to touch more hearts and souls, Andy brings his live music experience to venues throughout the Isle of Wight, continuing to be a beacon of hope and connection in a world that truly needs it.

Beyond music, Andy's passion extends to permaculture and natural patterns, embracing their potential to mend the harm caused by current systems.

Praise for Andy Roberts

"Always a pleasure to have Andy Roberts play at Caffè Isola!"

"Some great music and vocals, thanks for sharing my friend, cheered me up no end in these dark times." - Michael, online viewer.

“You are the real deal...” - Angelina Grimshaw-Musician

"You made lots of friends with your lovely choice of songs and playing. Will definitely invite you back" - The Hideaway.

"Great stuff as ever, Andy" - Paul Armfield.

Upcoming Projects

“Boulevard Days” has evolved from the name of a digital album with songs about Paris into a One Man Show telling his remarkable story in drama and song to be performed at theatres and pop up festival venues from summer 2024. There is now a physical CD of the 11 songs.

Connect with Andy

Discover Andy's music via Bandcamp, join the community of listeners on Facebook, or stay updated with his insights and updates here on Substack. Dive into a musical journey that promises depth, connection, and genuine emotion.

Short Bio:

Andy Roberts, based on the Isle of Wight, is a solo acoustic guitarist known for authentic and reflective songs. Drawing from personal experiences and his surroundings, Andy's music offers depth and genuine connection. Beyond tunes, he champions the potential of permaculture and natural patterns. Discover his music and join a community that finds solace in his melodies.
